spiral 0.99.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

current_spiral_vp()

Viewport name of current spiral

current_track_index()

Current track index

get_track_data()

Get meta-data of a track

n_tracks()

Number of tracks

phylo_to_dendrogame()

Convert a phylo object to a dendrogram object

spiral_arrow()

Draw circular arrows

spiral_axis()

Draw axis along the spiral curve

spiral_barplot()

Add rectangles to a track

spiral_clear()

Clear the spiral curve

spiral_dendrogram()

Draw dendrogram

spiral_highlight()

Highlight segments in the curve

spiral_highlight_by_theta()

Highlight a sector in the curve

spiral_horizon()

Draw horizon chart

spiral_info()

Information of the current spiral curve

spiral_initialize()

Initialize the spiral

spiral_lines()

Add lines to a track

spiral_opt()

Global options

spiral_phylo()

Draw phylogenetic tree

spiral_points()

Add points to a track

spiral_polygon()

Add lines to a track

spiral_raster()

Add image to a track

spiral_rect()

Add rectangles to a track

spiral_segments()

Add segments to a track

spiral_text()

Add lines to a track

spiral_track()

Add a track or go to an existed track

spiral_xaxis()

Draw axis along the spiral curve

spiral_yaxis()

Draw y-axis

xy_to_cartesian()

Convert coordinate from data coordinate to the canvas coordinate

xy_to_polar()

Convert coordinate from data coordinate to polar coordinate
